Text.Page:
I captured a bandit carrying a map wandering around the woods not too long ago. It seems that the bandits keep our goods at locations marked with circles on the map. It's the northeastern part of the Blood Run!

It's our chance to take back our stolen goods. , please help us.

If you go to the Blood Run, you'll find a pile of chests stolen by the bandits. Please bring our precious goods back!

Oh, oh! <PCNAME>, I really appreciate your help. With all the havoc caused by the devan brigands, I thought my property was lost for good, but you saved the day. The Gods will bless you! Oh, yes they will!
Did you find my crates? Or did the devas find you first? Hateful little critters, aren't they?
